Key Match Events: Pakistan set South Africa a target of 270
South Africa were put through a tense chase
Keshav Maharaj hit the winning runs
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa are now top of the table with 10 points from six games
Pakistan, on the other hand, are sixth with four points from six matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first heartstopping match of the 2023 World Cup
The match was arguably the best so far in this World Cup
Others: The first overthrow of the match was scored by Shamsi
The match was played at M.A. Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai
